data.prayer: Jesus, call those who are far off in Wake, United States Minor Outlying Islands, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Wake, United States Minor Outlying Islands
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, supernaturally prepare encounters with the gospel on sites like Facebook and Instagram for the 200 people living in Wake.
Spirit, teach the 80 believers in the state of Wake the wisdom of how to form simple, reproducible churches of 12-30 in every neighborhood.
Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Wake, United States Minor Outlying Islands.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Wake. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Wake, United States Minor Outlying Islands not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

data.prayer: Jesus, your return is closer than when we first believed. Please, set urgency in the hearts of the people living in the state of Wake.
data.verse: Besides this you know the time, that the hour has come for you to wake from sleep. For salvation is nearer to us now than when we first believed.

data.focus_label: Wake, United States Minor Outlying Islands
